name: ORSTED OFFSHORE NORTH AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Federal tax issues related to the generation of energy from offshore wind.
Federal tax issues related to the development and production of offshore wind energy. HR 5376 Build Back Better Act
Federal tax issues related to the development and production of offshore wind energy. H.R. 5376, PL 117-169 ("Inflation Reduction Act of 2022")
Federal tax issues related to the development and production of offshore wind energy. H.R. 5376, PL 117-169 ("Inflation Reduction Act of 2022")
Federal tax issues related to the development and production of offshore wind energy, including the investment tax credit, the domestic content credit and the energy communities credit.
